title: Sion's Legendary Skin ( quick feedback)
body:
The skin is 99% AMAZING! The reason why I say 99% is because there's one thing that's kinda bugging me and I wanted to know if this is something that will be changed.

When Sion recalls he sinks down ground level but at the end he flies down from the sky. Shouldn't it be he's rising from the ground? 

( It would've been sick if his Recall made him fly off as if he had rocket boots and then a slam down with SFX when he arrives he rift but that's just me)

replies.body:
Hiya 4NoxiousHours! 

Thanks for the feedback! 

For a bit of context, animations, especially longer animations like recalls, take ~2 weeks to create, so changing animations once they hit PBE aren't usually possible due to time constraints. :c Minor changes are possible, though! We'll talk about it!

Hi Katey! First, thank you for always taking the time to reply to people's inquiries!

In the skin spotlight video ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QvqW--AynXk ), we see Sion come out of the ground for what I can only assume is his spawn animation. I can certainly understand that making a whole new animation would be out of the question but perhaps swapping this animation with his current recall animation could be suggested? Thank you for your time, have a nice day!

Hey! 

Of course! With all the new content, today's my day of collecting feedback, so I'm poking around the boards. 

You're right, he does have a spawn animation. I'd be happy to suggest the change to our animator, we may not want to reuse the animation though, when we have something else for the recall. ^-^
Unfortunately not. :c Doing so would mean making rig, animation and potentially particle adjustments, which isn't a quick fix.
For more organic creatures, it's a tad easier, since he's comprised of metal plates, it's not as simple.

Hi Katey,

This is kind of off topic but I don't know where to post it:

Is there a possibility of adding a "customization" feature to future "personal shops" (like the snowdown one)?

Like for example we get those 5 or whatever sales, but we don't want to see those sales ever again.  So we can like check it off or something so it won't repeat in the future.

I don't even know if personal shops will return, but in case they do, it would be nice to exclude things I'll never buy.

Heyo! 

I don't personally work on this end of things - store stuff is a bit separate from the creation of skins. To my knowledge, this isn't something planned, at least in the immediate future. I'd be happy to pass your feedback on to the team. 

For a bit of context, the Snowdown Shop and Lunar Revel Shop were both early tries at this new feature, and we know there's a lot more that we can do, and there are places we can improve. Feedback like this is always helpful, especially when a new feature is growing. :)
